message: Let's split it 50/50, Bob. It's a fair start!
You could have gotten more, now it's my turn to make a better offer!
I'm willing to compromise, but I think I deserve a bit more. Your turn to think!
You're still too generous, Alice. I'm willing to give you a bit less, but I'm not giving up yet!
I'm not backing down. I think I deserve the majority of the money. Your turn to think!
I'm not giving up yet. I think I can do better than that, but I'm starting to get a bit desperate!
